website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want a protein bar with a different, softer texture and are focused on muscle building.
pros: Baked to create a texture that is soft, not hard or gooey
High in protein and fiber with only 5 grams of sugar
cons: Though the texture is pleasing, these bars are also prone to melting in high temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Selling Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, these muscle pharm combat crunch bars are NOT the same size as they used to be (or as they are when you purchase them in store). They also don’t taste the same - these are oddly synthetic tasting, the proper ones are not. It’s entirely possible that fakes are being sold on amazon - the printed images on the packaging as well as the writing looks like it either sat in the sun for awhile, or else was printed on an low quality printer - see attached images (left is fake, right is genuine). What are you trying to pull, Amazon?!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed? now it sucks
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I'm not the only one that doesn't like this anymore. I'm not sure if they recently changed the formula but these used to be good. Now it's hard as a rock when you bite it and taste flat. Not worth it anymore unless they changed it back to what it used to. Update: I contacted MusclePharm about the issue with the protein bar and they sent me a replacement that isn't the bad ones. They also said that they haven't changed the formula, so seems like these were just bad batch or really old bars. So if you're getting a bad one that's really hard to bite just contact them and they will send you a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dimas Maulana

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, probably old bars.
customer_reviews.text: I get these monthly (I'm subscribed) and the last 2 boxes I've gotten have not only been different in weight but different in taste and texture, and not in a good way. I ordered from bodybuilding.com and the bars were definitely the normal bars I absolutely love and enjoy. I will not continue to get these off of Amazon after these 2 repeated poor experiences. Will order directly from bodybuilding.com instead. These taste like they've been sitting around for years, and they also weigh ~10g less than the ones from the website.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V

customer_reviews.title: Did the Recipe Change?
customer_reviews.text: These have never been the healthiest protein bars on the market...the calorie vs. protein intake has always left much to be desired. However, they USED to taste amazing. I considered them my semi-cheat protein bars, since again they weren't the best, but man that flavor was worth it! I don't know why, but they've recently changed the recipe and they don't taste anywhere near as good as before. I finished the box, but only because I didn't see the point in returning the product sans one protein bar. The recipe change is the reason I fully transitioned into being a Quest Nutrition protein bar customer.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena KubotaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bar out there. Great texture!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a good number of protein bars and this has the best taste AND the best nutrition in my opinion. Seriously this texture can’t be beat. I think if you’re really worried about macros and the ratio of protein to carbs and fat, you may be better off with a powder, but this is my go-to when it comes to bars. I use them after early morning heavy lifts while I get ready for work or just eat it when I get to work. But if I’m just doing cardio or lighter lifts I stick to whole food sources and track to make sure I have enough protein for the day. Cookie dough is my favorite flavor by far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recipe changed yet again???
customer_reviews.text: Again, I think the musclepharm team is at it again, delivering a cheaper, worse-tasting product. For the past couple of years the product was great after they reversed their terrible decision to change their formula. I don't know if they did it again, but my most recent order was pretty bad. I don't think I came across one chocolate chunk. Cutting costs??? (I think so). The bar in general was more like filler Taffy than ever. I've found an alternative and until things clear up, bon voyage musclepharm.
customer_reviews.author: usawinston

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend these......
customer_reviews.text: Taste is not that bad on these, but, they do make you gain weight, and in my case, they mess with your liver, upon my doctor check up and me consuming these everyday in the past. They are made from lots of whey protein and sugar, which could be detrimental for your kidneys and in my case, once again, the liver. So, buy at your own risk!!! I rather stick to plant based protein, which in my opinion, is safer and healthier for your system. Think about it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul William E.

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor! I bought two flavors
customer_reviews.text: Very good flavor! I bought two flavors. Chocolate chip cookie dough is very crunchy. S'more is kind of chewy, nothing special, just like other bars. My boyfriend went crazy when he took the first bite of chocolate chip cookie dough flavored bar, he bought it by chance, and he even saved the package to buy it again! LOL so I ended up buying us three box in total......
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and not super expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious, the texture is soft like a fresh baked cookie, and it has no nasty aftertaste. The best part is they are not super expensive like similar brands, I'm looking at you Quest Bar. Quest bars are so dense and unappetizing in my opinion and this is delicious and soft and actually feels like a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Stale product from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This protein bar is one of the very best protein bars on the market, and tastes great! However, Amazon apparently buys up old/stale product from retailers and sells it at a five dollar discount. It’s worth the extra five dollars to get fresh product directly from Musclepharm - so much, fresher, softer and tastier!. I’ll never buy this product from Amazon Services again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Duhamel

customer_reviews.title: Why was there was change to consistency and taste?
customer_reviews.text: Why has muscle pharm changed the taste of these bars ??? They use to be amazing and tastes like a 100 grand candy bar. The ingredients and consistency changed. It's disappointing. I will still buy them but they are just not as good as they use to be. Shipping and service is typically good but it's just the bars itself and was wondering if anyone else noticed this change for someone that buys them all the time. I literally go through a box in a week or 2 but now due to the change of taste not sure. :-/
customer_reviews.author: ~H~

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar ever
customer_reviews.text: For sure this is the best protein bar I have ever tried. Compared with the others, even some well-known brands, this protein bar really dominating the flavor! It's like dessert to me in addition to the protein consumption. The size looks really good, it's better than the smaller size bars like Kirkland and some others. Worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Huang

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor out of all
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite flavor. It has a nice crunch and is filling. In my opinion, cookie dough > chocolate cake > s’mores > coconut. Now I get only cookie dough flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarath Barathi

customer_reviews.title: Hybrid Series = Gross, Not Crunchy
customer_reviews.text: The Sports Series bars are crunchy and have crunchy chocolate chips scattered throughout. They are delicious! The last batch I ordered was the inferior Hybrid Series formula. The Hybrid bars are light and fluffy like marshmellow, with no crunch. I hate the "original" Hybrid Series! I will not buy any more of these until I can be guaranteed the Sports Series formula.
customer_reviews.author: the_childlike_emperor

customer_reviews.title: Tasted ok, but does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: These bars tasted pretty good, but came back to haunt me in the form of terrible bloating and gas... I will not be purchasing these again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan or Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: That's NOT a candy bar says the cavity kid
customer_reviews.text: This is my breakfast food... holds my hunger for 5 hours until lunch. Works for me. I eat these for the protein but if you ask me how it tastes... well, it's better than a power bar or cliff hanger. Looks and tastes as advertised on the package. Won't complain as I need something to go with my coffee anyway. It is sticky like taffy and definitely brings out the flavor in my fu fu coffee. I think in certain circles they would call this "a great pairing." If you're interested in flavor, then try eating a real breakfast. =)
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Cookie Dough that's good for you
customer_reviews.text: These are the favorite protein bar in my house. They're soft but have a little crunch, are packed with protein, and don't have a gross chalky flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Heath

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Cut my lunch to a third.
customer_reviews.text: As always, tastes great, easy to eat. Eating one of these with my lunch everyday, I've cut my lunch down to a third of what it used to takento fill me up. I work 12 hour shifts. I'm a 200lb man. I hated working with a jam packed full belly, but a man gets hungry on a 12 hour shift. Enter, muscle Pharms protein bars. Excellent taste, filling. I prefer the chocolate chip cookie dough.
customer_reviews.author: E.John M.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Cards
customer_reviews.text: good taste but loaded with carbs . Also price fluctuate a lot. I signed in for automatic shipment when the price was low . they changed the price on me without asking and charged me more everytime until i noticed. NOT Fair
customer_reviews.author: Smove

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but not filling enough. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This bar tastes just like a candy bar! Definitely satisfies your craving for sweet tooth. Would be 5 stars but felt that the bar was just a bit smaller than most other high protein bars and melts easily. I usually get the bars that I can stick in my cargo pocket and take a bite or two to get me through to my next meal.
customer_reviews.author: Orey

customer_reviews.title: The green on the plastic wrapper is a no go, otherwise amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on here about some being good, and the first 2 boxes I got were the good ones. The third box, let me tell you it was on another level of bad. If you get the bad ones send them right back to Amazon, they aren’t even edible. I’ll attach a picture of what the crap ones look like so y’all will know what to look out for.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and filling
customer_reviews.text: Amazing taste. I’ve tried every protein bar under the sun and these have just become my favorite. The contrast in texture is really delicious and it’s not often a protein bar genuinely fills me up. I’m taking these to help lose weight and so far they’ve done a great job to keep me satiated. (And I eat abnormal amounts of food when not dieting)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein bar I’ve ever had They are so addictive I have to really hold back from eating them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, and reasonably good for you
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to my usual energy bar. Very soft and cookie-like inside, unlike the usual gritty crisped-rice kind. An excellent “bridge snack” for if you unexpectedly have to delay a meal a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Riley

customer_reviews.title: Tastes better than most chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm doing this review is because I have been utterly surprised by the taste of these bars. It's been a week since I bought these and I still go back to checking their nutricional values every time I have one of them - the reason being that they taste amazing, and I'll go as far as saying that they taste better than most chocolate bars. Honestly I bet these are the best tasting protein bars in existence!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Aristidou

customer_reviews.title: Makes stomachache
customer_reviews.text: Every time I eat this, I get stomachache for about a day. Even half of the bar is enough to get that pain. At first I though my diet is not healthy. So, I changed my diet completely to a healthy one. Still eating half of this bar is enough to bring the pain back.
customer_reviews.author: mohammadzaman z.

customer_reviews.title: Protein Bar with minimal sugar
customer_reviews.text: I tried the chocolate chip bar and loved it. I was looking for a protein bar that had minimal sugar and sugar alcohols and this one met my search., On top of protein, low sugar this bar is delicious. In fact, it is soooo good I have to hold back from eating too many, it is like eating a candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Originally I though these were about the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Originally I though these were about the same size as a regular candy bar, but these are actually bigger and it definitely fills me up as if I ate a small meal. I've only tried the chocolate chip cookie dough bars but they have a good amount of crunch on the outside of the chewy dough-like center. They are definitely pricey compared to other "protein bars," but these actually have a good amount of protein compared to others that barely have half the amount of protein and the fact that the bars are actually quite large justifies the price somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on the reviews. Which are very misleading. I've had nearly everything flavor of every brand and type of protein bars on the market. These are hardly edible. They are everything they claim not to be. It tastes awful, hard to even swallow without something to drink. I've heard they changed their formula. I must've received the new formula because the reviews certainly don't line up. Waste of money. The homeless wouldn't even eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Dorr

customer_reviews.title: Gaseous Gary
customer_reviews.text: Taste fine, but stomach can’t handle this protein bar. I’m surprised so much bloating can come from one small bar.
customer_reviews.author: Cmull

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but contains Malitol
customer_reviews.text: The Malitol in these bars can cause stomach upset so be wary!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: COOKIE DOUGH
customer_reviews.text: The best is chocolate cookie dough because it tastes exactly like cookie dough. I'm a chief and I know what's good and what's not. Pick cookie dough first and understand that you'll have to get us to the taste first.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: This bar is high in fiber and taste great. The bar is not super dense and hard to eat like most protein bars. This is one of the better bars to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT YOU'LL LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE TRUELY DELICOUS! THE BONUS, THEY ARE HEALHTY TO EAT.! ENJOY ONE FOR BREAKFAST MOST WORK DAY MORNINGS.. SOMETIMES WHEN I DO NOT FEEL LIKE EATING BREAKFAST, ENJOY EATING ONE AS A SNACK BEFORE LUNCH. HAVE TRIED MANY OTHER PROTIEN BARS AND DISLIKED THEM ALL. THESE YOU WILL TRUELY ENJOY! NO NASTY AFTER TASTE, EASY TO DIGEST, TRUELY A WONDERFUL MEAL REPLACEMENT...
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and texture; watch for rising prices
customer_reviews.text: Really like the taste and texture of these protein bars. Usually eat as a meal replacement. Also find good as something to throw in the bag and eat when feeling low energy or becoming hangry! Since adding to my monthly delivery, the price per box has risen by ~35%. Will cancel my subscription if the price rises anymore.
customer_reviews.author: TheSaltyDogg

customer_reviews.title: Changed recipe, YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite, especially the chocolate chip cookie dough. They changed the formula and now they are mediocre, at best. Yuck, I won't but again, the previous bars were WAY better.
customer_reviews.author: JJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting protein bars on the market in my opinion. They don't have the artificial sugar after-taste like some others.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hoppman

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but these are honestly the best tasting breakfast / energy / workout bars I ever ...
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but these are honestly the best tasting breakfast / energy / workout bars I ever tasted. I loved both flavors which surprised me given my general dislike of Reeses peanut butter cups. The taste is actually better than a candy bar, for me at least, because it's not as overly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: A.D. Lex

customer_reviews.title: Great, but don't order in the summer...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think about the heat while shipping, great product but a bit melted on arrival. Wasn't ruined, but I'll definitely wait till cooler weather before ordering again. My bad!
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: but this is more like a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: I alternate between this and Quest bars. Nutrition profiles are similar, but this is more like a candy bar, and Quest is a more traditional protein bar in terms of texture. Great stuff. I love the cookie crunch and chewiness. I wish they were about $25/box (like the Quest bars), but they are so good that I get them anyways. Big hit in our office with the fellas.
customer_reviews.author: KoNGo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & filling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these along with the FitJoy Nutrition Protein Bar and this bar was far superior in taste and consistency. I took them to Europe as emergency food and the did the trick and I didn't feel like I was suffering when I ate one.
customer_reviews.author: CC Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend as part of his deployment package. He loves these bars! They are much cheaper here than the store or their website.
customer_reviews.author: Musicgirl

customer_reviews.title: Next level taste
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but these bars are seriously game changing. I had been eating Big 100 chocolate chip cookie dough bars for years and thought they were the industry standard....the combat crunch simply blows it out of the water. These bars truly taste like a candy bar and deliver IMO one of the best balances of calorie/protein/dietary fiber ratios I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal every day
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most the bars I buy on Amazon I paid regular price for these and it was what I'd normally get for a sale bar I eat at least 1 a day to keep me strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Potvin

customer_reviews.title: Old and hardened
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor and often buy it, however They tasted a little old and didn’t feel as fresh
customer_reviews.author: Gabrie B.

customer_reviews.title: I used to LOVE these bars
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE these bars, but the latest negative reviews do not lie... the new formula bars (I got the chocolate peanut butter) are TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: They do taste pretty decent, although most flavors are strongly reminiscent of ...
customer_reviews.text: They do taste pretty decent, although most flavors are strongly reminiscent of each other (Cinnamon Roll is very different though, and that one is great!). I don't see that as being a bad thing, they all taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: BB Jones

customer_reviews.title: New bars are horrible
customer_reviews.text: The old bars are awesome. I just tried a single bar st a gas station of the new formula. It’s as bad as everyone says. What a waste of potential. This was my favorite bar and now it’s down to 1 stars for me. It’s that band.
customer_reviews.author: Customer #200

customer_reviews.title: S'mores
customer_reviews.text: Do not order the s'mores flavor. Compared to the others it is nearly expired 10/18 and hard as a rock. The other flavors taste better and expire in 2019
customer_reviews.author: Scott Walker

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and very filling. I'm new to the health and fitness game so I did a quick search on these before purchasing. They were rated in the top 10 protein bars on bobybuilder.com. I'm pleased with my purchase. You feel like you get a cheat day snack with these but are healthy for you. Great for overcoming the urges for a sweet treat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scheirer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but....
customer_reviews.text: This is THE tastiest protein bar I've ever had. Tastes just like a candy bar. Chocolatey, crunchy, and chewy. His protein and fiber. Unfortunately, it is very hard on the digestive system. Both my husband and I had to discontinue eating them. They're worth a try, though. Maybe your stomach can handle them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These taste amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting bar on the market. Low cal, high protein and fiber, minimal junk additives. 100% worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I thought that they were very good overall. I would rank them 2nd in taste ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a box of these to try. I thought that they were very good overall. I would rank them 2nd in taste only behind Fit Joy, which is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: JLT79

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great! Buy again soon!
customer_reviews.text: They taste great! Surprised by the fact they taste the way they say they would. I eat one everyday. They do help you poop also.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Light

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great and Lots of Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is the protein bar to buy. Helps my digestion too!
customer_reviews.author: Truth B Told

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate chip cookie dough is the Tastiest protein bar ever.... but warning, gives BAD gas
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product
customer_reviews.text: Its great! i use it as an on the go meal almost when Iam at work. I work in retail pharmacy and there is literally no time to eat anything, and when you do have time you have to stuff your face as fast as you can. This fits my needs perfect as iam always hungry and this fills me up really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Tran

customer_reviews.title: Used to be delicious - not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Updating my old review - something has changed with the formula of these bars since the summer because my most recent delivery was very disappointing. I loved these before - but they do not taste the same at all
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Todd

customer_reviews.title: Don't order these from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Normally I really like these, and I hate reviews that aren't completely about the product, but from Amazon they're extremely hard to chew both times I've ordered from them. Usually they're basically like a candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like the original
customer_reviews.text: The bars don't taste like the original ones they make. I just got some from Bodybuilding.com and they tasted way better than these. The inside has an orange tint to it and it makes my stomach hurt after eating them. I will go back to buying them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Ashley Crick

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping with prime
customer_reviews.text: Just as seller described. Good price and fast shipping with prime.
customer_reviews.author: 149powder

customer_reviews.title: Stuff your hole with these.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great meal replacement bar. Low calorie, low sugar, filling and taste great. The product isn't ready to expire like the Gatorade bars I previously bought. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tasty tasty

customer_reviews.title: They changed the formula! Now its icky
customer_reviews.text: First box of bars were great but then the second delivery had much thinner bars, with worse flavour, and texture. No way is the protein content still 20g. Not buying again until I know these changes have settled.
customer_reviews.author: asdasdasd

customer_reviews.title: I HATE protein bars
customer_reviews.text: I HATE protein bars. These? I can't stop eating. And eating these make me less hungry during the day yet I don't get a headache from not eating enough until dinner time. I love these and im super picky with food. Update a week later. -they are all gone. Craving more...
customer_reviews.author: CincySPQR

customer_reviews.title: New recipe is gross
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this is a new recipe that muscle pharm changed to recently (fall 2017) that not even worth buying or the calories. It tastes awful! I don’t know why they would go and change the recipe when there was nothing wrong with the original one. Please bring back the old recipe. That is only way I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Protein on the Go
customer_reviews.text: One of the best if not the best protein bar on the market. MusclePharm Combat Crunch bars taste delicious while providing 20 grams of high quality protein. Great for a quick snack or a post workout protein infusion.
customer_reviews.author: William A. DePalo

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Good protein bar without the nasty aftertaste. Great for taking a protein bar on the road. Only drawback is that the chocolate aspect can get crumbly and get on your clothes easily.
customer_reviews.author: ARD

customer_reviews.title: I've tried the white chocolate raspberry and cookie dough and they are both awesome. I have been eating quest bars for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is "Health Crack!!"...To date. I've tried the white chocolate raspberry and cookie dough and they are both awesome. I have been eating quest bars for the past 2 years and I must say that Combat Crunch wins out...
customer_reviews.author: Woatal

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and lots of protein. The bars seemed a little chewy to me though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: These used to be my favorite protein bar
customer_reviews.text: What happened to these? These used to be my favorite protein bar. Now its flatter, chalkier, and harder. Before I used to tell all my friends about how this tasted like a candy bar. Now it actually tastes like a protein bar. Go back to your original formula MusclePharm! I regret buying a whole case of these.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Qamar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is great and it's not terribly dry and chalky like most protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, husband really likes them a lot as an easy to grab snack or breakfast in the am if he’s in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Super duper
customer_reviews.text: Combats are great, and have a satisfying texture. Chewy n crunchy goodness...
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Delicious - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bars I have found. Low fat, sugar, and calories for the amount of protein, and they taste delicious! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and I am guilty of eating them because I want chocolate, not because I need a meal replacement or post-workout snack. I should work on that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fills me up
customer_reviews.text: Taste could be better, but I just love the number of carbs thats in the bar. Fills me up, and thats a plus, cause I dont want to eat that much and be hungry after eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cukjati

customer_reviews.title: Combat Crunch
customer_reviews.text: It's not only got a cool name, it tastes great at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Santini

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars!  LOTS OF PROTEIN!
customer_reviews.text: These a great! I have been eating Quest bars for so long that I got tired of them and needed a switch. My friend recommended these and they are pretty good. I've only tried Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough and Cookies N Cream, but I defintely prefer Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: You will be come So addicted to these that you will work out just so that you can have one!
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting...you WILL become addicted. I've tried the other flavors and none comes close to this one
customer_reviews.author: Llmar

customer_reviews.title: These taste amazing, and they have a crunch like the old ...
customer_reviews.text: These taste amazing, and they have a crunch like the old "Crunch" bars I grew up on. So far I've only had the Chocolate chip cookie dough. This flavor is not overly sweet and takes care of my hunger when I'm unable to eat a healthy meal like I should. These also don't have that weird taste that comes with most protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Overall the bar is actually not that bad BUT the problem is with the size as you ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bar is actually not that bad BUT the problem is with the size as you can see in the pictures below. The bar essentially fills only 3/4ths of its packaging and I don't think it is 63g in weight. Hope something is done to resolve this issue. The taste is all right.
customer_reviews.author: roshan raj

customer_reviews.title: ... the peanut butter one This one just taste too sweet but the peanut butter one actually taste a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the chocolate chip cookie dough but I really prefer the peanut butter one This one just taste too sweet but the peanut butter one actually taste a bit nutty instead of tasting like eating sugar alcohol
customer_reviews.author: RatherHonest

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I never ordered these before. they are great. . .
customer_reviews.author: Mark Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Mmm, mmm, good
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate chip cookie dough ones are my go-to protein bar. They taste absolutely delicious. It’s like I’m enjoying a candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: ALS223

customer_reviews.title: best!
customer_reviews.text: favorite protein bar due to deliciousness and 15g of fiber!
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Kerwill

customer_reviews.title: Nice and crunchy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and crunchy, very unique taste, try puting them in the fridge, become even more crunchier but a bit messier lol
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Azizi

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is good!
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is good! It’s more tasty than Quest’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New prime delivery sucks
customer_reviews.text: New prime delivery beat the hell out of the product. Is this worth $100+ per year if is going to look like this when delivered?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty, less sugar than other brands
customer_reviews.text: These things are delicious and have significantly less sugar than other brands I've tried. I take them to work for lunch time meal replacement to keep my protein intake up after my morning workouts. They can be a little bit messy so use caution if eating them in your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: One gone missing
customer_reviews.text: Great product I order these regularly this time 1 bar was missing. Will continue ordering. It happens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stale Bars - taste like brick
customer_reviews.text: Stale Stale Stale!!! The last fee times I have ordered these bars, they taste like bricks! I love the taste when they are a good batch but either they keep sending me a bad batch or they have changed the recipe to an awful mix
customer_reviews.author: kimberly cocotos

customer_reviews.title: Delicious protein crunch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most delicious bars ever... Just wish they were a few bucks cheaper... Ways more delicious than lung bars specially if you like crunch bars but you do pay for that lol... Great product will buy again when I can afford them lol
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like them ....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these but I just don't. They have a weird after taste that I just can't get past. I know protein bars aren't going to taste like a candy bar so I wasn't expecting that but I just didn't like these. Maybe I will try different flavors, I had the cookie dough. I will continue my search for a somewhat good tasting protein bar!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: Always the best! Low carbs high protein! I eat before or after heavy workout!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have a flavor that isn't overwhelming and a texture similar to a thick fudgy brownie.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Odell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They're good. Not the greatest value out there, but they'll satisfy you.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these before buying. Loads of fiber and protein. Great product, tastes great and the delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jeast

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite protein bar and I will change my stars to ...
customer_reviews.text: I just noticed the shipped says "chilled" Ive been ordering these about once a month for 6 months and they have NEVER been chilled. In fact, the past two times I had to put them in the freezer and I was home to hand take the order upon delivery. This is my favorite protein bar and I will change my stars to 5 if this issue is corrected on my next order which was just place a few mins ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Best taste
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bang for the buck. Low sugar with quality protein and a great taste. Perfect snack after or before workout.
customer_reviews.author: dexomatic

customer_reviews.title: like its been hanging around the warehouse for years
customer_reviews.text: hard as a rock, like its been hanging around the warehouse for years. don't order, this use to be my favorite and now I've switched back to quest bars. try selling freshly made protein bars and maybe i'll order again
customer_reviews.author: Noone

product_meta.title: MusclePharm Combat Crunch Protein Bar, 20g Protein, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bars, 12 Count
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough| Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)

For the athlete on the go or the workout enthusiast looking for extra protein, MusclePharm delivers a delicious and protein-packed gluten-free protein bar. Combat Crunch baked non-GMO protein bars are made using a proprietary baking process for superior taste with a softer texture. These high-protein bars have a low level of active carbs and tons of fiber. Our multi-layered Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough bar delivers balanced nutrition along with a soft yet crunchy texture and amazing flavor. Unlike hard-paste, taffy-like sports bars, Combat Crunch is like eating a soft-baked cookie. It contains 20 grams of protein and features whey protein isolate and milk protein isolate.

MusclePharm takes pride in using the best ingredients in our protein products. Combat Crunch Bars follow the standard of gluten free < 20 ppm gluten. They are low in sugar with high fiber and packed with high-quality protein isolates to meet your daily protein needs. Their dietary fiber supports healthy weight goals and digestion, while keeping you feeling full for longer. Combat Crunch Protein Bars have been the three-time recipient of Protein Bar of the Year, thanks largely to their delicious Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavor. These Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough protein bars have been certified by Informed-Choice. Athletes who see the Informed-Choice logo on a product know it has undergone rigorous checks and testing to ensure it is not contaminated with banned substances and is completely safe to use.

We take pride in making the best protein products designed for maximum protein intake with a delicious taste. Our Combat Crunch Bars are no exception to this rule. We sell Combat Crunch Protein Bars in a delicious Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavor, in a pack of 12 individually wrapped bars. We stand by the quality of each of our products.
feature_bullets: MULTI-LAYERED PROTEIN BAR: MusclePharm’s Combat Crunch Protein Bar is a multi-layered Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough bar that delivers balanced nutrition and a soft yet crunchy texture with superior taste

20 GRAMS OF PROTEIN: This protein bar is packed with 20 grams of protein, is gluten-free, contains no GMOs, and is low in sugar and carbs. Combat Crunch Bars follow the standard of gluten-free < 20 ppm gluten
AMAZING-TASTING PROTEIN BAR: The Combat Crunch Protein Bar is the three-time recipient of Protein Bar of the Year.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: All MusclePharm products are backed by a 30-day full money-back guarantee.

BANNED-SUBSTANCE TESTED and certified by Informed-Choice. Athletes who see the Informed-Choice logo on a product can be assured it has undergone rigorous checks and testing to ensure that it is not contaminated with banned substances and is safe to use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
